attributes.action: Annul the Cooper-Boles delay bill as it is a constitutional outrage and a farce.
attributes.additional_details: Furthermore, MP’s standing in the way of the U.K. leaving the EU (with or without a deal) are directly opposing the will of the majority in the EU referendum, and should be asked to leave their posts as they are unwilling to perform their duties.
attributes.background: The bill tabled by Yvette Cooper was rushed through in a single day to prevent the UK leaving the EU without a deal. This should be annulled as it is against the will of the people (EU referendum) and jeopardises the UK negotiating position for a deal to leave the EU.
